attributes.action: Allow Brentford F.C. to remain in the Coca-Cola League 1 for the 2007/2008 Season
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Brenford stand to be relegated, saving a miracle of biblical proportions.  As one of the best London Clubs around, especially in League 1, they attract tourists and foreign property investors to the area.  Unless they remain in League 1, our fair City will be in ruins.  For the sake of Londoners and Bees everywhere - KEEP BRENTFORD UP!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
